content.body: bakkot: (re tail calls) you said "instead move control back to the most recent `Let result be OrdinaryCallEvaluateBody(...)` step". I assume you mean the most recent "pending" OrdinaryCallEvaluateBody step. But I don't think that would work, because the first thing after that call is "Remove calleeContext from the execution context stack", which you don't want to do, because PrepareForTailCall already removed that context from the stack.
